dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“…
Where am I?”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}!?”

{Tifa}
“What is it, {Cloud}?
What is this?”

{Tifa}
“You're searching, aren't you
{Cloud}?”{PAUSE}“Searching…for yourself…”

“Is this the inside of your dreams?
Or is it…
your…subconscious?”

{Tifa}
“I can help, too.
We'll work together to try
and get the real you back!”

{Tifa}
“But…
Where do we start?”

{Tifa}
“It connects…
to Nibelheim?”

{Tifa}
“That's right…It's probably
best to start from there…”

{Tifa}
“Let's go have a look, {Cloud}.
I know it's not easy…
I'll be here for you…”

“The gates of Nibelheim…
Five years ago, Sephiroth
passed through these gates…”{PAUSE}“And…
That's how it all started…”

“That starry night at the well…
The promise we made then…
What if that memory was all a lie?”

“…A sealed up
secret…wish…”{PAUSE}“Tender feelings…
that no one can ever know…”

“If I could just get stronger…
Then even {Tifa} would
have to notice me…”

{Tifa}
“So that was it?”

{Tifa}
“Sorry, {Cloud}.”{PAUSE}“If I had only remembered
more clearly what happened,
I could have done something sooner…”
“It's not your fault, {Tifa}.”

{Tifa}
“But, I remember back
when we were eight!”

{Tifa}
“That's it! Now I know!”

{Tifa}
“You weren't created five
years ago.”{PAUSE}“My childhood memories
weren't all made up!”

{Tifa}
“Hang in there {Cloud}!
Just a little longer!
You've almost found the real you!”

{Tifa}
“Let's go back to
Nibelheim again!”

“The truth is right there.
We almost have the answer right in
the palm of our hands.”
